alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Allegany; Extreme Western Allegany; Garrett (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 04 at 12:27PM EST until March 04 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...The Allegheny and Potomac Highlands of Maryland, Virginia, and West Virginia as well as the Blue Ridge Mountains. * WHEN...Until 4 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Allegany; Extreme Western Allegany; Garrett
